Miles Sound System SDK 6.1c

AIL_3D_sample_attribute

The function AIL_3D_sample_attribute retrieves sample level attributes.

void AIL_3D_sample_attribute(
  H3DSAMPLE S,
  char const * attribute,
  void *value
);

In Parameters

S
indicates the 3D sample handle to retrieve the attribute from.
attribute
is a string variable describing the attribute to retrieve.

Out Parameters

value
is a pointer to a variable that will contain the return value.

Discussion

Most providers also publish provider-specific, sample level preferences - see the provider information at the end of this chapter for details.


Group: 3D Digital Audio Services
Related Functions: AIL_3D_provider_attribute, AIL_set_3D_sample_preference
Related Basic Types: H3DSAMPLE, char const *, void
